Type.Name: SizePreparedHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void SizePreparedHandler(object o, SizePreparedArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed SizePreparedHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the SizePreparedHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the SizePreparedHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the SizePreparedHandler is removed from the event.
